alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 6:06AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong South Winds and Elevated Surf Expected Sunday Night into Monday Night... Southerly gales will spread into the Northern Bering Sea on Sunday night and into the Chukchi Sea on Monday, then continue into Monday night. These winds will cause elevated surf from Emmonak to Nome to Red Dog Dock west from Sunday night into Mon night. Sea levels will rise several feet above normal high tides, with high surf possible. Areas east of Nome and Red Dog Dock will have lower winds speeds and are not expected to have elevated surf. The strongest winds will remain along capes of the West Coast and offshore where gusts of 50 to 60 mph are possible.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Yukon Delta Coast
